tweet: Today on #NationalHumanTraffickingDay, Secretary of State @JohnHMerrill reminds Alabamians that victims of domestic violence, or guardians of these victims, can have their information protected from voter rolls. Contact the SOS Office at (334) 242-7210 to learn more.
